name: Out of this World Delivery Service
name_original: Out of this World Delivery Service
description:
After months of suffering on your decaying planet, you have been granted the option to earn your way into a paradise planet. All that is asked from you is to deliver limited resources to helpless planets. In your trusty delivery truck, you will be speeding around the Wateryway Galaxy in order to maintain the health of six planets in need. Will you be able to handle the pressure?

Controls:

WASD (Recommended) / Arrows - Movement

Left Click - Shoot Projectile

Right Click - Move Black Hole

Space Bar - Freeze Truck Rotation
